vscodeLmLocalCache.description: Cache responses locally to avoid re-sending identical prompts. Reduces API usage but uses more memory/CPU for hashing and storing responses. Cached responses expire after 30 minutes.
vscodeLmLocalCache.label: Enable Local Prompt Caching

SPEECH_TO_TEXT.name: Speech-to-Text
SPEECH_TO_TEXT.description: Enable voice input for chat. Uses Deepgram API for real-time speech transcription. Requires ffmpeg to be installed on your system.
SPEECH_TO_TEXT.providerDescription: Select which provider to use for speech-to-text.
SPEECH_TO_TEXT.modelDescription: Select the Deepgram model to use for transcription. Nova-3 is recommended for best accuracy.
SPEECH_TO_TEXT.languageDescription: Select the language for speech recognition, or use auto-detect.
SPEECH_TO_TEXT.warningMissingKey: Deepgram API key is required for speech-to-text. Please configure it above.
SPEECH_TO_TEXT.successConfigured: Speech-to-text is configured and ready to use
